name: xterrafile
description: a pure Go tool for managing vendored modules and formulas using a YAML file

scripts.gitbranch: BRANCH=$(git symbolic-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null | cut -d"/" -f 3); if [[ "$BRANCH" != "master" ]]; then echo "you must be on master branch to release"; exit 1 ; fi
scripts.gitstatus: STATUS=$(git status --porcelain 2>&1); echo $STATUS; if [[ ! -z "$STATUS" ]]; then exit 1; fi;
